blog.name: cutlike-a-buffalo
blog.title: Never for money, always for love.

summary: Most of the Jaime/Brienne scenes are parallels to the Jonsa ones. They are shot almost the same way, their arguments, the sighs,...
body: Most of the Jaime/Brienne scenes are parallels to the Jonsa ones. They are shot almost the same way, their arguments, the sighs, the longing gazes, they gave each others presents, the physical contact, their goodbyes. That scene where Brienne tells Jaime to take Riverrun without blood shed they are arguing about politics and in the end Jaime listens to Brienne. The scene where Brienne grabs Jaime in s7 is almost the same as Jonsa’s. Both men are with other women. Jaime has been in love with Cersei for so long and gone too far for her that he can’t admit his feelings for Brienne, that would cause chaos. Jon’s priority is the war to come, he is Sansa’s “half brother” so he can’t admit his feelings because that would cause chaos. People say Brienne and Jaime are so romantic but they can’t see Jonsa?? They even had a long forhead kiss and serious eye-fucking, lip staring. And the parallels are not just Jaime/Brienne but also Ned/Cat Robb/Talisa. Why would they shoot their scenes almost the same way If it doesn’t mean anything? I think that in Jonsa at least one of them is in love.

title: Snowflakes
body:
Written for @jonsadrabbles day 3: Modern AU OR Snowflakes

Jon is a king now, which means he has duties and meetings to attend. But when the snow falls, Sansa just wants to built a snowman

Canon Divergence // Canon Compliant 

The cold wind screamed when it whirled around the castle. It creeped through each window and door, no matter how firmly shut it was. It filled the hallways, the living room, the bedroom and even the throne room where King Jon Snow welcomed his guests.

King Jon Snow. Sansa still couldn’t get used to the sound of it, to how the words tasted on her tongue, to everyone screaming the phrase on the top of their longs.

He deserved the title. He deserved it after what he had done for the North and after what he had done for Westeros. When someone dared to even think that Jon Snow had not worked hard enough to claim the throne, Sansa was the first to protest, to order Arya to take care of the matter before she would do so herself.

And Arya was always happy to oblige.

But Sansa also worried about Jon, carrying the weight of ruling on his shoulders and the weight of the crown on his head. The frown on his forehead deepened each day. The smile on his face faded each night. And sometimes Sansa missed the bastard he had once been, long before Ned Stark had lost his head in a dangerous game of chess with the ruling Lannisters, long before Robb Stark had led an army sound to avenge his father and had lost his life in the process, long before Jon lost whatever innocence he had once had.

“Jon?” Sansa reached for Jon’s hand and lead him to the giant window. The courtyard was covered in a thick layer of snow and more and more snowflakes were dangling to the ground to accompany the million others slowly melting there.

“Yes?” Jon turned his face towards her. Not too long ago she had been capable of making his worries disappear, of thawing his heart, of relaxing his brain. But now not even looking at her could ease the constant tension he was carrying around.

“I want to build a snowman.” Sansa curled her lips up into a slight smile. “Just like in all those stories.”

“You read too much, Sansa.” Jon shook his head, but a slight smile spread across his face. “You will freeze to death.”

Sansa reached for Jon’s hands and squeezed them firmly. “You can keep me warm.” She pulled him a little closer towards her. “I know you’re a king now, with responsibilities and boring meetings to attend, but do me this one favor. One favor and I will leave you be for the upcoming months.”

Jon let out a deep sigh, but then he gestured for the warm cloak Sansa had once made him. “If your lips turn blue…”

“Just kiss them.” Sansa interrupted him and pulled him towards the door. “We’re Starks. We’re made for this. We’re supposed to carry crowns of melting snowflakes in our hair.”

“I’m glad at least one of us is still dreaming these days.”

summary: You know, you’re finishing the most epic TV Show that there’s been. It had to feel like movies on TV. That’s what they’ve done....
caption:
You know, you’re finishing the most epic TV Show that there’s been. It had to feel like movies on TV. That’s what they’ve done. I’m really excited. Kit Harington, BBCTheOne Show.

My poor heart…

Amazing pic by Helen Sloan

summary: lol @ jonsas that think the north is gonna suddenly abandon jon once they find out he’s half targaryen and marrying a targaryen...
body:
lol @ jonsas that think the north is gonna suddenly abandon jon once they find out he’s half targaryen and marrying a targaryen princess. spoiler alert, they won’t care.

they’re gonna turn to jon, who looks more northerner than ned’s own kids, and say “your ned stark’s nephew. you fought and bled in the cold mud with us. you’re a northerner ”

and then he’s gonna defeat the others and rule the kingdoms as the greatest king there ever was.

summary: People love to talk about what’s canon or not canon. Well how about this; it’s canon that Jon Snow was looking at Sansa Stark’s...
body: People love to talk about what’s canon or not canon. Well how about this; it’s canon that Jon Snow was looking at Sansa Stark’s lips after he kissed her forehead on the battlements in season 6. Mind you, the parentage reveal hasn’t happened and at that point they’re supposed to still view each other as “brother and sister,” but that didn’t stop Jon and his ass was definitely looking!

reblog.comment: People love to talk about what’s canon or not canon. Well how about this; it’s canon that Jon Snow was looking at Sansa Stark’s lips after he kissed her forehead on the battlements in season 6. Mind you, the parentage reveal hasn’t happened and at that point they’re supposed to still view each other as “brother and sister,” but that didn’t stop Jon and his ass was definitely looking!

summary: "In my defense, if you show a key and you show a lock, I will put the key into the lock! It’s basic puzzle solving!"
body:
“In my defense, if you show a key and you show a lock, I will put the key into the lock! It’s basic puzzle solving!”

-Jon Snow

blog.description: I feed on cinema, tv shows, books, animals, history, music, travel, photography and especially laughter.

summary: George RR Martin doesn’t approve of incest or return of Targaryen. The moment when Jon's identity is revealed is a proof.
title: George RR Martin doesn’t approve of incest or return of Targaryen. The moment when Jon's identity is revealed is a proof.
body:
After much criticism of incest, I can not see the author ending his story with an incest. Moreover, even though he loves the Targaryen, George has shown enough that their reign and way of thinking was not good, that their dynasty was doomed. He can not finish by restoring the Targaryen. If Jon is one of them, it’s because they were not all bad and it would be a shame if their lineage goes out. But their custom and violence must disappear.

I often see the pro-Jonerys say that the story is about Dany and Jon, that they are soulmates. We can write a story on 2 characters without them necessarily end together. Plus, I think they’re more of a mirror for each other. Two Targaryen of the same age but with different culture, different experiences, different traditions. One closer to the Targaryen values ​​that caused the fall of this dynasty and the other having more honorable values. They are a family and intended to be opposed to the other to show which value is the best.

Yes, the Targaryen were for incest. But the author and the public to whom his books are addressed are against. And the end is supposed to bring a moral, and not revive a vicious circle. Not to mention the fact that Jon did not have a Targaryen education. He would never agree to be with his aunt.

I do not even speak of the idea of ​​their baby on the throne who seems to me quite creepy (possible but creepy). Jon did not have to be a Targaryen to have a child with Daenerys (the death of Viserions could have been enough). In addition, Game of Thrones shows us people playing and learning the throne game. It is not for this to end with a baby who has not accomplished anything by himself and who risks being crazy because born of incest.

This is not trivial if the revelation of Jon’s identity takes place at the end of season 6. If Jonerys really was the great couple, it would have been better to let us discover it before knowing their family bond. We could have appreciated their meeting, seeing them build a relationship, fall in love and then the revelation will come. The spectators, involved in this romance, would be shocked, disgusted but, at the same time, already attached to this couple. This would have been beneficial in all respects: shock announcement, reversal of situation and credibility of the couple.

Yet we learn this in Season 6, long before Jon meets Daenerys. This is a marked desire to take the audience a step back. Thus, when Dany and Jon meet and she will degrade Jon by claiming her right to the throne, the viewer will know that Jon is also an heir and her nephew. It becomes more complicated to appreciate and approve this romance. Even more when their love scene is interspersed with the image of Dany’s brother’s wedding and Bran’s voiceover announcing that Jon is the rightful heir.

Everything is done to make us feel uncomfortable and worried about the danger that this coming together and this revelation will have over the rest of the story.


P/S : I have nothing against those who do not think like me. We all have different visions. But when these people insult and mock other ship or point of view while their own is questionable, I have a problem.

blog.name: nobodysuspectsthebutterfly
blog.title: Nobody ever suspects the butterfly...
blog.description:
Hey, you can call me Mindset, or Butterfly.
I like: Comics, ASOIAF, music, art, books, sf & fantasy, butterflies, birds, pretty rocks, and many other things. See my sidebar tags and links for more details.
I help mod: ASOIAF University and A Song of Theories.
Note to ASOIAF fandom followers: I've read all the books, and rarely if ever cut for spoilers, sorry. Please check my FAQ and the other links on my sidebar for more info.

tags: 'why does ghost‚ the largest direwolf‚ not simply eat the other five?'
summary: Do you think Ghost being bigger than the rest means something?
question: Do you think Ghost being bigger than the rest means something?
answer:
Ghost is a sport in several ways – he’s albino, and he’s mute. He was also the first of the direwolf pups to open his eyes, to try and escape their doomed situation.

Once they had been six, five whimpering blind in the snow beside their dead mother, sucking cool milk from her hard dead nipples whilst he crawled off alone. –ADWD, Jon I

So it’s not surprising that Ghost also grew to be larger than the other direwolves.

But then, you have the thoughts of Varamyr Sixskins…

He had known what Snow was the moment he saw that great white direwolf stalking silent at his side. One skinchanger can always sense another. Mance should have let me take the direwolf. There would be a second life worthy of a king. –ADWD, Prologue

and that’s pretty darn significant whatever size Ghost may be…

title: Targaryen alone...
body:
Do you  need to be in shock? OK I am here for it 

There is only four Targaryen in whole ASOIAF/GOT :Dany,Jon,Viserys and Aemon 

One  of them is with Dany and second one is with Jon.

‘‘Targaryen alone in the world is the most terrible thing…’‘

Both are far from central events.On one wall, the other on the other continent…

Yes it’s fact but just look at this scenes 

Denerys Targaryen with Viserys Targaryen

Jon Snow/Aegon targaryen with Aemon Targaryen 

Daenerys Targaryen when she liberated the city Meerin and  she became a Queen

Jon Snow when he liberated Winterfell  and he  became a King 

hahahahaha small detail there .Ser Jorah entered the room and said ‘’My queen ‘’

Maister Wolkan entered the room and said ‘’My king’’ 

Enjoy !!!

I have elevated to a whole new level of shipping
summary: Omg you’re aegon and dany is aegon reborn and jon’s name is aegon and arya idolizes aegon’s warrior queens wow it all makes...
question: Omg you’re aegon and dany is aegon reborn and jon’s name is aegon and arya idolizes aegon’s warrior queens wow it all makes sense
answer:
asdfghjkl ANON YOU MADE MY DAY

hot take: if your OT3 isn’t canon, become the OT3 instead

blog.name: ladystarks
blog.title: lo, the transforming power of love

body:
jonsadrabbles day 3

Prompt - Modern AU | Snowflakes

When they meet again, she has snowflakes in her hair.

The image is so striking, so reminiscent of Robb, that Jon nearly falls apart on the spot, but somehow she is running towards him and he is catching her and–

He never thought he’d see his family again.

The image of her in the snow is painful, but in a way Jon hasn’t been used to in some time. It’s a sweet sort of pain, a remembrance of those he’s lost, but also those he hasn’t. And so when she follows him into Castle Black, he’s almost sad to see those snowflakes melt.
